ticket.title: acts_as_list manual install and test?
ticket.original-body:
Due to some corporate firewall difficulties I decided to go to my home Mac and install the plugin in a rails project and then just copy the plugin from the vendors/plugin folder to my (inside) corporate project.
Is there a special registration that needs to take place somehow for the plugin as rails doesn't seem to recognize the method yet.
How do you run the "test" function that is in the plugin directory?
BTW, I'm just following along in the Rails Up and Running book's examples to execute through this.

version.title: acts_as_list manual install and test?

version.body: This is not the correct place to discuss things, is only for bug reports or feature requests. I think you can be helped on rubyonrails-talk mailing list. Thanks.
version.body-html:
This is not the correct place to discuss things, is only for bug reports or feature requests.
I think you can be helped on rubyonrails-talk mailing list.
Thanks.
version.title: acts_as_list manual install and test?

version.body: My apologies. This was the first time to this list. I'll focus it on bug reports only in the future and have already reposted to the Google mailing list group. I am curious however why acts_as_list and acts_as_tree aren't in the rails baseline. Seems like a pretty standard feature for relationships in most database apps.
version.body-html: My apologies. This was the first time to this list. I'll focus it on bug reports only in the future and have already reposted to the Google mailing list group. I am curious however why acts_as_list and acts_as_tree aren't in the rails baseline. Seems like a pretty standard feature for relationships in most database apps.
